subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Hi Everyone!
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Hi Suzanne. Welcome to the group!

Misty 


--- On Thu, 7/31/08, suzyq6819 <suzyq6819@...> wrote:

> From: suzyq6819 <suzyq6819@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Hi Everyone!
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Thursday, July 31, 2008, 11:29 AM
> Hi all!  My name is Suzanne, my husband is Sarge and
> we're new to the 
> group.  We recently formed MMPS or MI Metro Paranormal
> Society.  We 
> have thirteen members and are based in southern lower MI.
> We're so happy to have found this group!  My husband is
> working on our 
> first 'box'.  I'm amazed at what I've heard
> and can't wait to try ours 
> out!  Have a wonderful day everyone :)
